name: VIRTRA SYSTEMS
overview: VirTra Systems, Inc. manufactures, markets, and sells immersive virtual reality products to the law enforcement and military markets in the United States and internationally. The company offers two different versions of its IVR 360-degree high-definition firearms training simulators, including the IVR HD for use in marksmanship, conflict resolution, and situational awareness training of law enforcement and security officers; and the IVR 4G for use in military firearms/marksmanship training, situational awareness, and fourth-generation squad-based training. Competition The company’s competitors include Advanced Interactive Systems, Inc.; Cubic Defense Applications; Firearms Training Systems, Inc.; Laser Shot; MPRI (L-3 Company); and IES Interactive Training, Inc. History VirTra Systems, Inc. was founded in 1993.

milestones.description: VirTra Systems Receives $2 Million Multi-location Order From Gander Mountain
milestones.source_description: VirTra Systems Receives $2 Million Multi-location Order From Gander Mountain
